data.message: Guess who's back nikkii's back tell a friend Nokia's back nikkiis back I created a monster nobody wants 2 see Nikkii on chopped liver I'll give u a bit of me and some hard liqueur I'll make u some chilled chillies cakes and give u some lollies too. I'll wrap my lips around a chop a chomp make u a vegemite sandwich and suck on a Tim tam too nobody wants to sue u they love u and 2020  when ur president u can come see me anytime we should calaberate .I'll take u 2 cloud 9. I'm the real Nikkii minaj just wait I'll bring the sun shine and when I cry it rains linke a river.Love u eminem slim Marshall the mathers lll I'm 38  this year getting old  a.d I still love u.I'm ur biggest fan in the universe ur phenominal.😇💏😂🙌😅😀😝😇
